ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Timorous Deep Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Uh you can wait safely on the island outpost while you wait for the shuttle to come to the dock.  The shuttles stop at the dock there and then go back to the
ygData.messageBody:
Uh you can wait safely on the island outpost while you wait for the shuttle
to come to the dock. The shuttles stop at the dock there and then go back
to the big ship. True, the ship is headed to the BB shuttles at that point,
but at least you will be on it and can just wait for it to complete the
circle. No hanging around in water is required, there are even two taverns
on the island.

Kit

To me, a shuttle is a boat. I am also quite reluctent
to paddle around in the water for 20 min or so,
checking my loc all the while so that I can attempt
climbing onto one of those tall shuttles. I don't
have the patience and I am not that brave...there is a
lvl 50 or thereabouts mob that swims near the teleport
pots for the evil races....I wasn't willing to wait
around to see if it ranges far or has a cousin the
lives to the North;-)
